mapper.insert:
insert into product_tb(prdCode, prdName, prdPrice, prdOname, prdRname, prdMadeIn, prdMt, prdCnt, prdQc, prdCare, prdMadeDate) values(#{prdCode}, #{prdName}, #{prdPrice}, #{prdOname}, #{prdRname}, #{prdMadeIn}, #{prdMt}, #{prdCnt}, #{prdQc}, #{prdCare}, #{prdMadeDate})
select MAX(prdIndex) from product_tb
mapper.select: select prdIndex, prdCode, prdName, prdPrice, prdRname from product_tb order by prdDate desc limit 0, #{maxPrd}

SELECT product_tb.prdIndex, prdCode, prdName, prdPrice, prdRname, ifnull(sum(orderTotalPrice),0) as prdSales FROM product_tb left join order_tb on product_tb.prdIndex = order_tb.prdIndex GROUP BY prdIndex ORDER BY prdSales DESC limit 0, #{maxPrd};
